org.nd4j.jita.allocator.context.impl

Class BasicContextPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.allocator.context.impl.BasicContextPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextPool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PackedContextPool

    public class BasicContextPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextPool
    This is context pool implementation, addressing shared cublas allocations together with shared stream pools Each context given contains: 1. Stream for custom kernel invocations. 2. cuBLAS handle tied with separate stream.
